name: Spiderbug
description:
Parenthood is hard, no one can deny that, but just imagine you are a parent of a few little spider-babies. One time they get lost and you have to get on a journey to the microworld of bugs and insects or even the walls of buildings to get back your lost children, but beware, some of the bugs are dangerous!

A game that was created in the Game Off 2021 with the leading "Bug" theme. We thought a lot about how to implement it and we found bugs as insects a fitting theme.
